pages.text: The $(#00a8a8)Camera Obscura$() is quite a powerful artifact. For one, it is considered a $(l:mechanics/safety_items)safety item$(), as it will protect you from receiving unwanted attention - so long as $(#00a800)you have shots left on your roll of film$(). And be warned, sometimes the $(#00a800)smell of blood$() will override a creature's fear of having its soul stolen.

The $(#00a8a8)Camera Obscura$() is also capable of $(6)harming spirit monsters$(). Creatures affected by the camera are:$(br)$(li) Cave Dweller$(li) Captain Cornelia $(li) Ghouls $(li) Ghoulings $(li) Nightmares $(li) Reapers $(li) Revenants $(li) Wraiths $(li) Tortured Souls

pages.title: Making a Camera
pages.text: Although they're challenging to make, it's a good idea to craft one right away.$(br2)You'll need it for gaining $(l:mechanics/insight)Insight$(), and for protection.

$(d)Film is crucial$() - the camera cannot protect you without usable film. You can craft $(#00a8a8)Film$(), or buy it with $(#00a8a8)Insight$().$(br2)If you defeat a creature with the camera's power, you gain $(#00a8a8)extra Insight$().
